cause.description:
Many people consider the day their child was born the happiest day in their life. In the world's wealthier countries, that is but in poorer countries, the day a child is born is all too often the day its mother dies. ---------- A woman dies from complications in childbirth every minute about 529,000 each year... The vast majority of them in developing countries
1. Women Shouldn't Die giving Life
2. 99% of deaths occur in Less Developed Countries
3. Life time risk of maternal death in Niger is 1/7, while it is 1/28 000 in Sweden
4. There is a high need for more skilled attendance at birth and Emergency Obstetrical Care
cause.mission: Support the fight to improve Maternal health
cause.name: Safe Motherhood
